summary: A color change on the elven quiver to dark metal with red feathers.
descriptionHtml:
The gold color of the elven quiver didn\'t exactly fit with the dark assassin vibe of the nightingale armor (I use Zerofrost\'s awesome Nightingale Prime texture mod( [url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1896]http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1896[/url] ) which I added some red accents to.

So, as my first texture modification ever I decided to make the elven quiver fit in better with the look of that armor.  I made it predominantly a black metal look with the embossed feathers in crimson.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/tPAsb.jpg[/img]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/kWUR8h.jpg[/img]

I hope to modify more textures in the future.. if you have any in particular you\'d like me to take a crack at just let me know.
author: mgbeach

files.name: Black and Red Elven Quiver-Corrected Folder Structure
